courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the power of AI to create consistent, animated characters from scratch in this in-depth course! Whether you’re an aspiring animator, storyteller, or digital creator, this course will teach you step-by-step how to use cutting-edge tools like Leonardo AI, ChatGPT, and Haiper AI to bring your creative visions to life.

9D  You will learn 

  1. Leonardo AI & ChatGpt- Create Consistent Animated Characters From Scratch

  2. Generating Story With ChatGPT

  3. Leonardo Ai - Generating Images

  4. Experiment - Changing Model Character

  5. Animate Character - Haiper Ai And Remove watermark

Begin with the basics of Leonardo AI, where you’ll learn how to design consistent characters that maintain their unique style across various uses. Consistency is key when building memorable characters, and you’ll master techniques to ensure your designs remain cohesive and professional.

Next, dive into storytelling with ChatGPT, generating rich and engaging narratives to complement your characters. Whether for animation, branding, or creative storytelling, these narratives will help you build characters with depth and purpose. Use Leonardo AI to generate stunning images of your characters, then experiment with changing models and refining their looks to create unique variations that match your vision.

Once your characters are ready, bring them to life with Haiper AI, transforming static designs into dynamic animations that captivate audiences. You’ll also learn how to remove watermarks, ensuring a polished, professional finish for your projects.

This course provides hands-on experience with advanced AI tools, making it easier than ever to design and animate characters without prior experience. By the end of the course, you’ll have a complete skill set for producing high-quality animated content. Whether you’re looking to grow your creative portfolio, launch a YouTube channel, or create characters for branding or storytelling, this course will give you the tools and confidence to succeed.

Join us and discover how Leonardo AI, ChatGPT, and Haiper AI can revolutionize your creative process, unlocking limitless possibilities for character creation and animation!

people who love AI tool

courseDetails.shortDescription: Uncover the Secrets of Successful Products for Outstanding User Experience. Design unique product that your users love!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Product Design Using Design Thinking 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Product Design Course! (with over 900 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated:  FEBRUARY 2025): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


The world finally understands the essential role of design. Products look better than ever, interfaces feel intuitive, and companies are hiring designers at an increasing rate. But, the designer’s role has been changing over the last few years. It’s no longer enough to iterate and understand your user, instead in today’s world, designers should be able to do both – identify problems and build solutions, which will increase their worth by at least 10 times for any company. When you can do both, you can do things that no one else can do and you will be a unique asset to your company.


There’s a shift underway in large organizations, one that puts design much closer to the center of the enterprise. But the shift isn’t about aesthetics. It’s about applying the principles of design for a better user experience. This new approach is in large part a response to the increasing complexity of modern technology and modern business.  


Most people don't think about how poorly designed everyday interactions are until they learn the principles of good design and user experience, many of which are not intuitive. You don't need to be born thinking about this stuff in order to become a successful designer, it's a skill that can be developed like anything else. Passion often follows knowledge and expertise.   


In this course, I have explained the entire design process which when integrated into your product can create an amazing user experience. You will also learn to approach a problem in a systematic manner. Working in a series is the most important stage of the design process. The ability to experiment, value and learn from mistakes, and build on the experience achieved is the hallmark of the truly successful and creative individual, whatever the field.    


So, what are you waiting for??

Get Enrolled and start your journey today…
